onAfterCallSystem(address,bytes32,bytes).details: Provides the ability to add custom logic or checks after a system call completes.

params.callData: Data that was sent as part of the system call.
params.msgSender: The original sender of the system call.
params.systemId: The identifier for the system that was called.

onBeforeCallSystem(address,bytes32,bytes.details: Provides the ability to add custom logic or checks before a system is invoked.

params.callData: Data being sent as part of the system call.
params.msgSender: The original sender of the system call.
params.systemId: The identifier for the system being called.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Overridden from IERC165 to include the system hook interface.

params.interfaceId: The bytes4 interface identifier, as specified in ERC-165.

returns._0: true if the contract implements `interfaceId`, false otherwise.

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Checks if the contract implements a given interface.
